alert.note: Alert for Issaquena (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:43PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL EAST CARROLL PARISH IN NORTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHWESTERN ISSAQUENA COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CST... At 543 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Providence, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mayersville around 550 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi.
